data.actual_result: Long Search history results don't fade and cause overlap with the plus sign
data.expected_result: Search history results fade at the end where the sign is as it does on White Theme
data.short_description: Long Search history results overlap the plus sign on Dark Theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Search and search for a long string of characters - Close Search and re-open it - Observe the History results and hover over to see the plus sign being overlapped
